@apaszke what do you think of the following?

  1. Added file init method tests in run_test for tcp and mpi; this seemed a reasonable tradeoff between always running (takes longer) and never running (could break); this was chosen because TCP and Gloo share the same test code.
  2. added "with this backend" to the error message about world side having to be set for tcp:// and file://; since it doesn't actually need to be set for MPI (and it didn't seem worth reporting the backend here, especially in light of the cpp unit tests that are backend independent).
